data.text: @Cartoon4sale @NemoOutisUK Depends who sets the metrics. We have seen in Canada recently repercussions for protests depends on if the government supports your opinion or not. I think as long as you are not inciting physical harm/violence you should be able to speak freely.
@normie011 @NemoOutisUK Surely it depends how extreme that opinion is?

@NemoOutisUK @Cartoon4sale You can definitely disagree with him and put your views across. If a lot of people disagree with him then he can have a think about it. The word castigated sounds like punishing someone for voicing an opinion and I don’t agree with that.
@normie011 @Cartoon4sale And he’s entitled to be castigated for it. That’s freedom of expression for you

@Cartoon4sale Im not sure id call him disgraced he has quite a healthy following and is doing good work bringing light to government overeach in UK and Canada something all good cartoonists should be doing
@Cartoon4sale His entitled to an opinion whether right or wrong
@Cartoon4sale They appear to be coherent tweets about the uses of government force
